attributes.action: not give Leeds United there points back!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leeds United do not deserve there points back. They didnt stick to the rules and they deserved to start on -15 points. Leeds should have another 5 points taken away for complaining!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
